Stoke City's win at Hull was only their second away league win on a Tuesday night in 14 years and 27 attempts.
It's not much better on a Wednesday, with four in 24 stretching back to 2007. And it's … [+4030 chars]

articles.author: Josh Lawless
articles.title: Gavi's highlights for Barcelona against Bayern Munich are breathtaking - SPORTbible
articles.description: 18-year-old sensation Gavi was incredible in Barcelona's 2-0 defeat to Bayern Munich.
articles.content:
Gavi might have been on the losing side for Barcelona against Bayern Munich but he still dropped a jaw-dropping performance at the Allianz Arena.
The Blaugrana dominated the German champions for lar… [+1928 chars]
